markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Olfactory Stimulators](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2150)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 105 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This cluster of sensitive wire whiskers fits over the nose or snout to provide sensory information as it reacts to nearby odors and other scents. A creature wearing _olfactory stimulators_ gains a sense of smell, which is as precise as an average member of its species, as well as the [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) special ability if members of its species typically have that ability. _Olfactory stimulators_ can be fitted to animal companions as well as sapient creatures; stimulators produced for companion use have the [companion](/Traits.aspx?ID=29) trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Olfactory Stimulators (Bloodhound)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 105 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 136 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

These _olfactory stimulators_ can be enhanced to better localize scents.

<document level="2" id="action-1654" />
name: Olfactory Stimulators (Bloodhound)
